1.name: DerZyklop
1.text:
Hello Hugo!

I’m happy to hear from you. It was kind of harder then i expected to find out which setup is the right one for me, which tools i should use and how they are working. So it was my intention to write this down to help others skip this part.

### About the performance

The raspberry pi is smooth enaugh for me. Some people told me, that it is sluggish when you stream HD files while the database-update process is running in the back. But i never experienced this problem. And i have the outdated **Raspberry Pi B**. The **B+** has even more CPU power.

### About the remote

Check (link: http://der-zyklop.de/blog/remote-for-xbmc-on-raspberry-pi text: this article about remotes for XBMC).

### About CouchPotato on Pi

My fault! I wanted to install it on my Pi, wrote the article at the same time, changed my plan and didn‘t correct one sentence in my article. So my CouchPotato is running well on my NAS :)
